title: Elementary Science Teacher Competency Enhancement Program Using Technology-Supported Self-Regulated Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Elementary Science Curriculum and Basic Teaching Methods
context.additional_context: Project-based education integrating self-regulated learning strategies using digital tools and applying them to science lesson design

learning_goals: Learners can apply the six self-regulated learning strategies (planning, reflection, training, prompting, feedback, technology utilization) to science classes
Learners can create and analyze personalized self-regulated learning reports using LMS-based digital tools
Learners complete a self-regulated learning model-based elementary science lesson design project and receive peer evaluation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
